title: Former Solo queue Challenger ridicules me on stream
body:
TL; DR Below

So today I loaded into a ranked solo queue game to climb my account out of low ELO like I have failed to do for the past several seasons. 

I enter the game and am greeted by a twitchstream link from the opposing teams midlaner, I open it to hear the person say something about smurfing, being challenger in season 5 and 6, hardstuck D1 for the past 2 years, and other stuff.

20 minutes later, 14 - 0, 200 cs, 2 shots everyone, kept typing in /all chat XD team 2 heavy 2 carry lmao, RIP galaxy I made your ADC 0 - 9, stay bronze while I reach Plat, I don't even need to farm my lane I can kill your bot lane faster than 2 caster minions, 

He then roamed top to attempt to shut me down, but I pressed Q twice and deleted him, he then went on to flame me on his Livestream about how poggers my champ was, anyway we duo for 2 games afterwardsand have some fun while he taught me the basics of rotations and pressuring lanes

He then adds me on his D1 65 LP account which had ended challenger in season 5 and 6 , says Hi and then unfriends me

TL;DR met a diamond smurf who enjoyed flaming everyone, putting people down, saying inappropriate things on stream, and had a tendency to brag about his actual ELO, and made me sad about the matchmaking system
